_description: Christ’s crucified face — one monorhyming quatrain in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook introduced by ‘Apparet mihi quod facies Christi’

NLS18721.Transcription:
Is wan of betingIs foul of spetingIs grisli of bolningAn
                    reuli of weping
